name: List_Restaurants_By_Search_Query
response_summary:
The response provides a list of restaurants in New York City from TripAdvisor, showing page 2 out of 333 total pages, with 34 restaurants displayed from a total of 10,000 listings. 

The first restaurant featured is **Bustronome New York**, a premium dining experience with an impressive 4.8-star rating from 87 reviews. It offers American and European cuisine in a high-end setting ($$$$) and includes a scenic glass-roof view. While it doesn’t offer delivery, reservations can be made via OpenTable. 

Next is **La Piazza New York**, another premium Italian restaurant with a perfect 5-star rating, though based on only five reviews. It also falls into the $$$$ price range and provides an elegant dining experience, though it lacks a menu link. Reservations are available through OpenTable. 

Lastly, **Pepe Giallo** is a more affordable Italian option ($$ - $$$) with a solid 4.4-star rating from 273 reviews. Unlike the others, it offers delivery via Grubhub and has a more relaxed atmosphere. 

The listings include sponsored and non-sponsored options, with some providing direct menu and reservation links. The restaurants span different price ranges and cuisines, catering to various dining preferences in New York City.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers and food enthusiasts looking for dining options in a specific location. It retrieves a list of restaurants based on a search query, including details like cuisine type, price range, ratings, and reservation options. Users can browse through paginated results to explore various dining experiences, from high-end to budget-friendly options. The response includes key information such as ratings, reviews, and booking links.

enhanced_parameters.query: Search term for restaurants, typically a city or cuisine name.
enhanced_parameters.page: Specifies the pagination number for restaurant listings.

link.description: URL link to the current page of restaurant listings on TripAdvisor

total_pages.description: Total number of pages available for restaurant listings

total_items_count.description: Total number of restaurant listings available

items_count.description: Number of restaurant listings displayed on the current page

results.description: List of restaurant objects with detailed information

link.description: URL link to the restaurant's page on TripAdvisor

reviews.description: Number of reviews the restaurant has received

rating.description: Average rating of the restaurant (out of 5)

price_range_usd.description: Price range of the restaurant in USD (e.g., $$ - $$$, $$$$)

is_sponsored.description: Indicates if the restaurant listing is sponsored

menu_link.description: URL link to the restaurant's menu (null if not available)

reservation_link.description: URL link for making reservations (e.g., via OpenTable or Grubhub)

featured_image.description: URL link to the featured image of the restaurant

latitude.description: Geographical latitude of the restaurant's location

longitude.description: Geographical longitude of the restaurant's location

has_delivery.description: Indicates if the restaurant offers delivery service

is_premium.description: Indicates if the restaurant is a premium listing

cuisines.description: List of cuisines offered by the restaurant
